entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:34 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:34 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
